<@ba.rem>Infinite duration, skill can be manually deactivated</>

skchr_blkngt_2.name: Peaceful Slumber
skchr_blkngt_2.description:
Immediately inflict <$ba.sleep>Slumber</> to all ground enemies around the Tactical Point for <@ba.vup>{blkngt_s_2.duration}</> seconds and obtain <@ba.vup>{cost}</> DP. For <@ba.vup>{blkngt_s_2.duration}</> seconds, the Hypnos' attacks change to Arts splash attacks that deal <@ba.vup>{blkngt_s_2.atk_scale:0%}</> damage against <$ba.sleep>Slumbering</> targets
<@ba.rem>Can hold 1 charge</>

skchr_tachak_1.name: Incendiary Grenade
skchr_tachak_1.description: Fire an incendiary grenade at the target, creating a burning zone in the 4 adjacent tiles lasting for <@ba.vup>{projectile_delay_time}</> seconds. Ground enemies within the burning zone receive <@ba.vup>{atk_scale:0%}</> Arts damage every second. When attacking enemies within the burning zone, Tachanka ignores <@ba.vup>{def_penetrate_fixed}</> of the target's DEF

When the skill ends, deal Physical damage equal to <@ba.vup>{attack@atk_scale:0%}</> of current ATK to all ground enemies ahead and <$ba.stun>Stun</> them for <@ba.vup>{attack@stun}</> second
<@ba.rem>Skill can be manually deactivated</>

<$ba.overdrive>Overdrive</>: Increase the upper limit for the Float Unit's damage increase from Trait to <@ba.vup>{scale:0%}</>, ATK <@ba.vup>+{atk:0%}</>. Rockrock is <$ba.stun>Stunned</> for a duration equal to the Overdrive duration after the skill ends
<@ba.rem>The Float Unit will return after the enemy is killed or the skill ends. Skill can be manually deactivated</>

skchr_sntlla_2.name: “Witch's Tears”
skchr_sntlla_2.description: <@ba.vup>Expand</> Attack Range, massively reduce Attack Interval (<@ba.vup>{base_attack_time} seconds</>). Attacks change to summoning icicles above random tiles within Attack Range. When the icicles impact the ground, inflict <$ba.cold>Chill</> to all nearby enemies for <@ba.vup>{attack@cold}</> second and deal <@ba.vup>{attack@atk_scale:0%}</> Arts damage

Attack Range <@ba.vup>+{ability_range_forward_extend}</> tiles. Heal <@ba.vup>{attack@max_target}</> targets simultaneously. 
All [Medic] operators gain ATK <@ba.vup>+{atk:0%}</>

skchr_toddi_2.name: Portable Castle-Breaching Arrows
skchr_toddi_2.description:
Slightly increase Attack Interval (<@ba.vdown>+{base_attack_time} seconds</>). Attacks fire Dragon Arrows that deal <@ba.vup>{attack@atk_scale:0%}</> Physical damage. The arrows explode after a short duration when hitting an enemy, dealing an additional <@ba.vup>{attack@splash_atk_scale:0%}</> Physical damage to the target and nearby enemies. 
<@ba.rem>Upon skill activation, Toddifons gains {attack@trigger_time} arrows and the skill ends when all arrows are used (skill can be manually deactivated)</>

skchr_greyy2_2.name: Beacon of Dawn
skchr_greyy2_2.description:
Fires a lightning ball towards the target's position that lasts for <@ba.vup>{projectile_delay_time}</> seconds. The lightning ball deals <@ba.vup>{atk_scale:0%}</> Arts damage to all nearby enemies every <@ba.vup>{interval}</> seconds, with each hit having <@ba.vup>{prob:0%}</> chance to <$ba.sluggish>Slow</> the target for <@ba.vup>{sluggish}</> seconds
<@ba.rem>Can hold {ct} charges</>

The lightning ball deals <@ba.vup>{atk_scale:0%}</> Arts damage to all nearby enemies every <@ba.vup>{interval}</> seconds, with each hit having <@ba.vup>{prob:0%}</> chance to <$ba.sluggish>Slow</> the target for <@ba.vup>{sluggish}</> seconds
<@ba.rem>Can hold {ct} charges</>

skchr_ash_2.name: Assault Tactics
skchr_ash_2.description:
Immediately trigger Talent 1. Greatly reduce Attack Interval (<@ba.vup>{base_attack_time:0%}</>). When attacking <$ba.stun>Stunned</> enemies, deal <@ba.vup>{ash_s_2[atk_scale].atk_scale:0%}</> damage. 
<@ba.rem>Upon skill activation, Ash gains 31 bullets and the skill ends when all bullets are used (skill can be manually deactivated)</>

skchr_ash_3.name: Breaching Round
skchr_ash_3.description: Fire a Breaching Round forwards, dealing <@ba.vup>{atk_scale:0%}</> Physical damage to enemies along the way and pushing them back with <@ba.vup>medium</> force. When the Breaching Round explodes, deal <@ba.vup>{not_hitwall_scale:0%}</> Physical damage to all nearby enemies (if the Breaching Round is flying along a ground tile and hits a high tile, it will immediately explode and deal <@ba.vup>{hitwall_scale:0%}</> Physical damage). <@ba.rem>Can only be used 2 times per deployment</>

skchr_typhon_3.name: “Eternal Hunt”
skchr_typhon_3.description:
Immediately mark a target within Attack Range. Greatly increase Attack Interval (<@ba.vdown>+{base_attack_time} seconds</>) and attacks change to firing volleys of arrows at the marked target; The arrows will target random enemies around the marked target, dealing a total of <@ba.vup>{attack@s3_atk_scale:0%}</> Physical damage <@ba.vup>{attack@s3_max_hit_num}</> times and Stunning the target for <@ba.vup>{attack@s3_stun}</> seconds
<@ba.rem>Upon skill activation, Typhon gains {attack@s3_trigger_time} ammo and the skill ends when all ammo is used (skill can be manually deactivated)</>

ATK <@ba.vup>+{atk:0%}</>. Attacks create a layer of sticky liquid within Attack Range, lasting for {attack@projectile_life_time} seconds. The sticky liquid inflicts <@ba.vup>{attack@move_speed:0%}</> Movement Speed and <@ba.vup>{attack@def}</> DEF to ground enemies (does not stack). <$ba.charged>Charged</> effect: Gains {attack@another_trigger_time} ammo instead
<@ba.rem>Upon skill activation, Ch'en gains {attack@trigger_time} ammo and the skill ends when all ammo is used (skill can be manually deactivated)</>

skchr_chen2_3.name: “Holiday Storm”
skchr_chen2_3.description:
<@ba.vup>Expand Attack Range</>, ATK <@ba.vup>+{atk:0%}</>. Attacks deal 2 hits and apply Trait effect to all enemies within Attack Range. Attacks create a layer of sticky liquid within Attack Range, lasting for {attack@projectile_life_time} seconds. The sticky liquid inflicts <@ba.vup>{attack@move_speed:0%}</> Movement Speed and <@ba.vup>{attack@def}</> DEF to ground enemies (does not stack)
<@ba.rem>Upon skill activation, Ch'en gains {attack@trigger_time} ammo. Attacks consume 2 ammo and the skill ends when all ammo is used (skill can be manually deactivated)</>

skchr_ray_3.name: “Seeing the Light”
skchr_ray_3.description:
Immediately <@ba.vdown>stop attacking</> until all bullets are reloaded. Massively reduce reload interval (<@ba.vup>{reload_interval} seconds</>), <@ba.vup>expand</> Attack Range, attacks deal <@ba.vup>{attack@atk_scale:0%}</> Physical damage and Bind the target for <@ba.vup>{attack@unmove_duration}</> seconds
<@ba.rem>If an enemy is defeated within the skill duration, gain {sp} SP when the skill ends</>

Inflict <$ba.sluggish>Slow</> and <@ba.vup>{debuff.damage_scale:0%}</> <$ba.fragile>Fragility</> effect to enemies within the 8 surrounding tiles of the Ensign. Retrieve the Ensign after the skill ends

sktok_mlyss_wtrman_1.name: 流形
sktok_mlyss_wtrman_1.description: 可复制待部署区一名干员，若为远程时获得特性每攻击<@ba.vup>10</>次在周围四格可部署位分裂自身（持续<@ba.vup>25</>秒），近战时每次攻击<$ba.steal>偷取</>敌方<@ba.vup>10</>点攻击力与防御力（最高<@ba.vup>250</>点，复制后重置）

skchr_ines_3.name: Lone Shadow's Return
skchr_ines_3.description:
<@ba.rem>The first deployment does not consume DP. Instead, Ines places a Shadow Sentinel, retreats and refreshes her redeployment time</>
After deployment, ATK <@ba.vup>+{atk:0%}</>. Immediately retrieve the Shadow Sentinel and deal <@ba.vup>{atk_scale:0%}</> Physical damage to up to <@ba.vup>{max_target}</> enemies it passes through. Within the skill duration, obtain <@ba.vup>{cost}</> DP for every attack against an enemy

<@ba.rem>The first deployment does not consume DP. Instead, Ines places a Shadow Sentinel, retreats and refreshes her redeployment time</>
After deployment, ATK <@ba.vup>+{atk:0%}</>. Immediately retrieve the Shadow Sentinel and deal <@ba.vup>{atk_scale:0%}</> Physical damage to up to <@ba.vup>{max_target}</> enemies it passes through. Within the skill duration, obtain <@ba.vup>{cost}</> DP for every attack against an enemy

Attacks change to whirlwinds which travel forward, dealing damage proportional to distance traveled and maxing out after 3 tiles. The whirlwinds <$ba.levitate>Levitate</> the first target hit for <@ba.vup>{attack@levitate}</> seconds and deal Arts damage ranging from a minimum of <@ba.vup>{attack@min_atk_scale:0%}</> damage to a maximum of <@ba.vup>{attack@max_atk_scale:0%}</> damage

skchr_pasngr_3.name: Glorious Shards
skchr_pasngr_3.description: Immediately generate a Lightning Storm centered on the target with the highest HP within a wide range, lasting for <@ba.vup>{duration}</> seconds. Do an additional attack dealing <@ba.vup>{atk_scale:0%}</> damage against a random enemy within the Lightning Storm every <@ba.vup>{interval}</> seconds. <@ba.rem>Can hold {ct} charges</>

skchr_mgllan_1.name: High-efficiency Refrigeration Module
skchr_mgllan_1.description:
Passive: Magallan and her drones inflict <$ba.sluggish>Slow</> to all enemies within Attack Range for <@ba.vup>{attack@sluggish}</> seconds every <@ba.vup>{attack@interval}</> seconds. 
Active: <$ba.sluggish>Slow</> effect is changed to <$ba.root>Bind</> for <@ba.vup>{attack@frozen_duration}</> seconds. <@ba.rem>Retrieve all drones after the skill ends</>

skchr_ling_3.name: To Remain Oneself
skchr_ling_3.description:
Passive: Summons can only be deployed on melee tiles. If there are other summons within Attack Range, combine with them into a <@ba.vup>Higher form</>
Active: Ling and her summons gain ATK <@ba.vup>+{atk:0%}</> and DEF <@ba.vup>+{def:0%}</>. Each summon deals Arts damage equal to <@ba.vup>{atk_scale:0%}</> of Ling's ATK every <@ba.vup>{interval}</> seconds to enemies within the 4 adjacent tiles
<@ba.rem>When the skill ends, obtain 1 summon</>

skchr_lmlee_2.name: Exorcise Evil
skchr_lmlee_2.description: Passive: Attack Speed <@ba.vup>+{attack_speed}</>; Active: Mark the target and increase their Taunt level. The mark explodes after <@ba.vup>{paper_duration}</> seconds, dealing <@ba.vup>{default_atk_scale:0%}</> Arts damage to nearby enemies. Every hit on the marked target increases the explosion damage by <@ba.vup>{factor_atk_scale:0%}</> of Lee's ATK (increases up to <@ba.vup>{max_stack_cnt}</> times, prematurely explodes if the limit is reached or the target dies)

skchr_lmlee_3.name: Honored Guests
skchr_lmlee_3.description:
<@ba.vup>Expand</> Attack Range, ATK and DEF <@ba.vup>+{atk:0%}</>. Attacks push all enemies within range except the current target away with <@ba.vup>small</> force. Increase Taunt level and gain <@ba.vup>{prob:0%}</> Physical and Arts Evasion against attacks coming from outside his Attack Range
<@ba.rem>Infinite duration</>

skchr_swire2_1.name: Righteous Philanthropist
skchr_swire2_1.description:

skchr_swire2_2.name: “Welcome Gift”
skchr_swire2_2.description:
Spend <@ba.vup>1</> Coin. Place a Champagne bomb on a deployable and passable ground tile within range. The Champagne bomb will explode upon contact with the first enemy encountered, dealing <@ba.vup>{atk_scale:0%}</> Physical damage and <$ba.sluggish>Slowing</> the target for <@ba.vup>{sluggish}</> seconds
<@ba.rem>If the Champagne bomb is left alone for 3 seconds, it will deal 1 additional hit; When equipping this skill, Coin limit is 3</>

skchr_swire2_3.name: Decadence
skchr_swire2_3.description:
Attacks deal 2 hits. When defeating an enemy, gain 1 Coin. When skill is manually deactivated, spend <@ba.vup>all</> Coins and carry out random attacks against enemies ahead. Each Coin spent deals <@ba.vup>{atk_scale:0%}</> Physical damage and pushes the target away with <@ba.vup>small</> force
<@ba.rem>Infinite duration, skill can be manually deactivated; When equipping this skill, Coin limit is 10</>

<@ba.rem>Infinite duration, skill can be manually deactivated; When equipping this skill, Coin limit is 10</>

skchr_weedy_3.description: Immediately fire a shot of compressed LN2, dealing <@ba.vup>{atk_scale:0%}</> Arts splash damage and pushing the targets away with <@ba.vup>medium</> force. skchr_ghost2_3.description: Increase Attack Interval (<@ba.vdown>+{base_attack_time} second</>), ATK <@ba.vup>+{atk:0%}</>, Max HP <@ba.vup>+{max_hp:0%}</>. skchr_reed2_3.name: Tinders of Life
skchr_reed2_3.description:
Attack <@ba.vup>2</> targets simultaneously, ATK <@ba.vup>+{reed2_skil_3[switch_mode].atk:0%}</>. Increase Talent 1 activation chance to <@ba.vup>100%</>. Within the skill duration, enemies afflicted with Firebrand receive Arts damage equal to <@ba.vup>{talent@s3_atk_scale:0%}</> of Reed's ATK every second; When defeated, they deal Arts damage equal to <@ba.vup>{talent@aoe_scale:0%}</> of Reed's ATK to nearby enemies and inflict Firebrand to them
<@ba.rem>Firebrand effects last until the skill ends</>

ATK <@ba.vup>+{atk:0%}</>, DEF <@ba.vup>+{def:0%}</>, Block Count <@ba.vup>+{block_cnt}</>, recover <@ba.vup>{hp_recovery_per_sec_by_max_hp_ratio:0%}</> Max HP every second. 
<@ba.rem>Eunectes is <$ba.stun>Stunned</> for {stun} seconds after the skill ends</>

skchr_horn_1.name: Illumination Grenade
skchr_horn_1.description:

skchr_horn_2.name: Storm Order
skchr_horn_2.description:
Attacks deal <@ba.vup>{attack@s2.atk_scale:0%}</> Physical Splash damage
<$ba.overdrive>Overdrive</>: Attacks deal an additional <@ba.vup>{attack@s2.magic_atk_scale:0%}</> <@ba.vup>Arts</> Splash damage. When manually deactivating the skill, fire all remaining ammo and lose <@ba.vdown>{attack@s2.hp_ratio:0%}</> HP
<@ba.rem>Upon skill activation, Horn gains 10 ammo and the skill ends when all ammo is used (skill can be manually deactivated)</>

skchr_jesca2_3.name: Saturated Burst
skchr_jesca2_3.description:
Attack Range <@ba.vup>+1</> tile, increase Attack Interval (<@ba.vdown>+{base_attack_time} seconds</>), ATK <@ba.vup>+{atk:0%}</>, DEF <@ba.vup>+{jesca2_s_3[def].def:0%}</>. Mobile Personnel Shield DEF <@ba.vup>+{jesca2_s_3_token[def].def:0%}</>
When the shield is deployed, immediately fire a shell ahead that explodes upon hitting an enemy or reaching the end of its range, dealing <@ba.vup>{attack@extrabomb.atk_scale:0%}</> Physical damage to all enemies within range and <$ba.stun>Stunning</> them for <@ba.vup>{attack@extrabomb.stun}</> seconds
<@ba.rem>Upon skill activation, Jessica gains {attack@trigger_time} ammo and the skill ends when all ammo is used (skill can be manually deactivated)</>

When the shield is deployed, immediately fire a shell ahead that explodes upon hitting an enemy or reaching the end of its range, dealing <@ba.vup>{attack@extrabomb.atk_scale:0%}</> Physical damage to all enemies within range and <$ba.stun>Stunning</> them for <@ba.vup>{attack@extrabomb.stun}</> seconds
<@ba.rem>Upon skill activation, Jessica gains {attack@trigger_time} ammo and the skill ends when all ammo is used (skill can be manually deactivated)</>

skchr_nearl2_2.description:

After deployment, ATK <@ba.vup>+{atk:0%}</> and gain <@ba.vup>{times}</> layers of <$ba.shield>Shield</>. When the skill ends, automatically retreat and redeployment time is increased by <@ba.vup>{value:0%}</>. If the last deployed operator is a [Kazimierz] operator, redeployment time <@ba.vup>will not increase</>

<@ba.rem>Can hold 2 charges</>

skchr_chyue_3.name: One's Non-existence
skchr_chyue_3.description: Deal <@ba.vup>{atk_scale:0%}</> Physical damage to the target and nearby enemies; After using the skill <@ba.vup>5 times</>: <@ba.vup>Expand</> Attack Range and attacks deal <@ba.vup>2 hits</>. Skill becomes <@ba.vdown>Auto Trigger</> and deals an <@ba.vup>additional hit</>

skchr_excu2_3.description:
Slightly increase Attack Interval (<@ba.vdown>+{base_attack_time} seconds</>), <@ba.vup>expand</> Attack Range, ATK <@ba.vup>+{atk:0%}</>. Every 1 ammo spent increases ATK by an additional <@ba.vup>+{attack@atk:0%}</> (up to {attack@max_stack_cnt} times). Increase HP recovery effect of Trait to <@ba.vup>{trait_ratio}x</>. Increase Attack Interval (<@ba.vdown>+{base_attack_time} seconds</>), <@ba.vup>expand</> Attack Range. Attacks deal <@ba.vup>2</> hits, with each hit dealing <@ba.vup>{attack@atk_scale:0%}</> damage
<@ba.rem>If an enemy is defeated within the skill duration, the Trait effect will not reset after the skill ends. Skill can be manually deactivated</>

skchr_mlynar_3.description: <@ba.vup>Expand</> Attack Range, increase Trait effect to <@ba.vup>{trait_up}</>x (Trait effect <@ba.vup>{per_kill_reduce:0%}</> whenever an enemy is defeated). Attacks deal <@ba.vup>{attack@atk_scale:0%}</> Physical damage to up to <@ba.vup>{attack@max_target}</> targets. When enemies within Attack Range are attacked by [Kazimierz] operators, deal additional <@ba.vup>True</> damage equal to <@ba.vup>{atk_scale:0%}</> of Młynar's ATK

sktok_crate.name: Blockade
sktok_crate.description: 设置障碍，改变敌人的行进路线\n<@ba.rem>如果障碍阻挡了敌人，敌人会破坏此障碍</>

sktok_emp.name: EMP Detonation
sktok_emp.description: 消耗<@ba.vup>{cost}</>点部署费用，立即对周围所有敌人造成伤害，并使全部命中目标<$ba.stun>晕眩</><@ba.vup>{stun}</>秒

sktok_emp.name: EMP Detonation
sktok_emp.description: 消耗<@ba.vup>{cost}</>点部署费用，立即对周围所有敌人造成伤害，并使全部命中目标<$ba.stun>晕眩</><@ba.vup>{stun}</>秒

sktok_gate.name: Close the Gate
sktok_gate.description: 消耗<@ba.vup>{cost}</>点部署费用，关闭闸门

sktok_sensor.name: Anti-stealth
sktok_sensor.description: 开启时周围敌方单位的<$ba.invisible>隐匿</>效果失效

sktok_antidr.name: Drone Interference
sktok_antidr.description: 范围内的敌方无人机<@ba.vup>无法攻击</>，<@ba.vup>失去特殊能力</>，并<@ba.vup>减速50%</>\n<@ba.rem>敌人会优先攻击此装置</>

sktok_ballis.name: Fire the Ballista
sktok_ballis.description: 向前方射出一支弩箭，对碰到的第一名我方干员造成物理伤害

sktok_farm.name: 启动！
sktok_farm.description: 消耗<@ba.vup>{cost}</>点部署费用，防御力<@ba.vup>+{def:0%}</>，法术抗性<@ba.vup>+{magic_resistance}</>，每秒回复10点生命，部署干员单位数<@ba.vup>+{value}</>

sktok_frosts.name: 寒潮
sktok_frosts.description: 发射一道寒霜冲击波，使周围我方单位陷入<$ba.cold>寒冷</>状态{freeze}秒

sktok_ore.name: 脉冲波
sktok_ore.description: 向四周喷发脉冲波，对周围所有我方与敌方单位造成<@ba.vup>{value}</>真实伤害。并使特殊敌人获得强化。

sktok_mine.name: 触爆
sktok_mine.description: 启动后敌人经过时会触发爆炸，对周围所有敌人造成<@ba.vup>{damage}</>真实伤害，并在<@ba.vup>{duration}</>秒内使其受到的伤害<@ba.vup>+50%</>

sktok_blower.name: 气流
sktok_blower.description: 向前方3格吹出气流；与气流<@ba.vup>同向</>/<@ba.vdown>逆向</>部署的干员攻击<@ba.vup>提升</>/<@ba.vdown>降低</>；<@ba.vdown>同向</>/<@ba.vup>逆向</>移动的敌人移速<@ba.vdown>提升</>/<@ba.vup>降低</>

sktok_tower.name: 法术传输协议
sktok_tower.description: 每次攻击对一名敌方单位造成<@ba.vup>{talent@tower_t_4[magic_attack].atk_scale:0%}</>生命上限的法术伤害；每{talent@tower_t_5[heal][persistent].interval}秒恢复一名友方单位<@ba.vup>{attack@tower_heal[target].hp_ratio:0%}</>生命值

sktok_tower.name: 法术传输协议
sktok_tower.description: 每次攻击对一名敌方单位造成<@ba.vup>{talent@tower_t_4[magic_attack].atk_scale:0%}</>生命上限的法术伤害；每{talent@tower_t_5[heal][persistent].interval}秒恢复一名友方单位<@ba.vup>{attack@tower_heal[target].hp_ratio:0%}</>生命值

sktok_tower.name: 法术传输协议
sktok_tower.description: 每次攻击对一名敌方单位造成<@ba.vup>{talent@tower_t_4[magic_attack].atk_scale:0%}</>生命上限的法术伤害；每{talent@tower_t_5[heal][persistent].interval}秒恢复一名友方单位<@ba.vup>{attack@tower_heal[target].hp_ratio:0%}</>生命值

sktok_tree.name: 天然隐蔽
sktok_tree.description: 相邻的我方单位防御<@ba.vup>提升</>；被<罗德岛临时雇员>清理后成为可部署的远程位

sktok_bomb.name: 坏脾气
sktok_bomb.description: 对周围四格范围的敌人造成<@ba.vup>{attack@stun}</>秒<$ba.stun>晕眩</>

sktok_electric.name: 通电！
sktok_electric.description: 激活：每<@ba.vup>{interval}</>秒激发电流对经过的敌人造成<@ba.vup>{attack@value}</>点法术伤害，并使其<$ba.sluggish>停顿</><@ba.vup>{attack@sluggish}</>秒

sktok_roadblock.name: 道路阻塞
sktok_roadblock.description: 可以阻挡乌萨斯平民与斗士塔露拉前进。可被我方单位击毁

sktok_flame.name: 能量结晶
sktok_flame.description: 25秒后自爆，向周身四方向发出火球，击中目标时造成<@ba.vup>{damage}</>点法术伤害，并使其施加【烈焚灼息】（每秒受到真实伤害且伤害递增，可被<$ba.buffres>抵抗</>）

sktok_flame.name: 能量结晶
sktok_flame.description: 25秒后自爆，向周身四方向发出火球，击中目标时造成<@ba.vup>{damage}</>点法术伤害，并使其施加【烈焚灼息】（每秒受到真实伤害且伤害递增，可被<$ba.buffres>抵抗</>）

sktok_frosts_friend.name: 寒潮
sktok_frosts_friend.description: 发射一道寒霜冲击波，使周围敌方单位陷入<$ba.cold>寒冷</>状态{cold}秒

sktok_ore_friend.name: 脉冲波
sktok_ore_friend.description: 向四周喷发脉冲波，对周围所有敌方单位造成<@ba.vup>{value}</>真实伤害。

sktok_npcsld.name: 列阵！
sktok_npcsld.description: 更容易受到敌方的攻击

sktok_prison.name: 启动禁锢！
sktok_prison.description: 消耗<@ba.vup>{cost}</>点部署费用，使范围内目标<$ba.stun>晕眩</><@ba.vup>{stun}</>秒，并立即进入禁锢状态（不会重置禁锢状态敌人的攻击计数）

sktok_inverter.name: 撼动现实
sktok_inverter.description: 部署后爆炸，对周围四格所有敌人造成<@ba.vup>{attack@damage}</>法术伤害，并使范围内所有敌人与晦明之印<@ba.vup>属性变化</>

sktok_stone.name: Blockade
sktok_stone.description: 初始部署在场景中，改变敌人的行进路线\n<@ba.rem>如果障碍阻挡了敌人，敌人会破坏此障碍</>

sktok_cannon_1.name: 脉冲束流
sktok_cannon_1.description: 相邻范围内每存在一个我方单位，每秒回复<@ba.vup>1</>点技力；相邻的我方单位防御力下降<@ba.vup>50%</>，更容易受到敌方攻击；消耗<@ba.vup>{cost}</>点部署费用，对<@ba.vup>下层测试区</>的敌人造成<@ba.vup>5000</>点真实伤害并使其<$ba.stun>晕眩</><@ba.vup>7</>秒

sktok_cannon_2.name: 脉冲束流
sktok_cannon_2.description: 消耗<@ba.vup>{cost}</>点部署费用，对攻击范围内所有敌人造成<@ba.vup>{damage}</>点真实伤害并使其<$ba.stun>晕眩</><@ba.vup>{stun}</>秒

sktok_poison_1.name: 关闭阀门
sktok_poison_1.description: 开启时，相邻范围内每存在一个我方单位，每秒回复<@ba.vup>1</>点技力；相邻的我方单位防御力下降<@ba.vup>50%</>，更容易受到敌方攻击；<@ba.vup>下层测试区</>对应范围内的所有友方单位每秒受到<@ba.vup>120</>点真实伤害

sktok_poison_2.name: 开启阀门
sktok_poison_2.description: 开启时，攻击范围内所有我方单位每秒受到<@ba.vup>120</>点真实伤害

sktok_factory_1.name: 生产线
sktok_factory_1.description: 相邻范围内每存在一个我方单位，每秒回复<@ba.vup>1</>点技力；相邻的我方单位防御力下降<@ba.vup>50%</>，更容易受到敌方攻击；消耗<@ba.vup>{cost}</>点部署费用，在<@ba.vup>下层测试区</>对应位置部署一架二手无人机

sktok_factory_2.name: 生产线
sktok_factory_2.description: 消耗<@ba.vup>{cost}</>点部署费用，部署一架二手无人机

sktok_factory_2.name: 生产线
sktok_factory_2.description: 消耗<@ba.vup>{cost}</>点部署费用，部署一架二手无人机

sktok_sleep.name: 救援绳索
sktok_sleep.description: 立即撤退干员，并减少<@ba.vup>80%</>再部署时间

sktok_emperor.name: Punchline
sktok_emperor.description: <@ba.xa>尝</><@ba.xb>尝</><@ba.xc>大</><@ba.xd>帝</><@ba.xe>的</><@ba.xf>厉</><@ba.xg>害</><@ba.xa>，</><@ba.xb>跟</><@ba.xc>着</><@ba.xd>音</><@ba.xe>乐</><@ba.xf>燥</><@ba.xg>起</><@ba.xa>来</><@ba.xb>！</><@ba.xc>！</>\n神一般的说唱歌手，可以自如变换flow；\n很一般的说唱歌手，只会遛弯。

sktok_mound.name: 风沙掩体
sktok_mound.description: 阻挡<@ba.vup>沙尘暴</>，加固后立即回复所有生命值、防御力<@ba.vup>+{def}</>且不再受到<@ba.vup>沙尘暴</>的伤害但可以被<高能源石炸弹>直接摧毁。

sktok_mound.name: 风沙掩体
sktok_mound.description: 加固状态：阻挡<@ba.vup>沙尘暴</>，不再受到<@ba.vup>沙尘暴</>的伤害但可以被<高能源石炸弹>直接摧毁。

sktok_sbomb.name: 起爆
sktok_sbomb.description: 对攻击范围内所有敌方单位造成相当于攻击力<@ba.vup>100%</>点的真实伤害，可直接摧毁<土石结构>。

sktok_machst.name: 强化加固
sktok_machst.description: 部署后对前方一个<土石结构>进行<@ba.vup>加固</>，<@ba.vup>10</>秒后自动撤退。用于强化建筑墙体的施工材料，会有热心的本地人帮忙搭建。

sktok_airsup.name: 派遣空援
sktok_airsup.description: 佣兵小队布置的可移动战术机库，根据需要可随时发射无人机支援作战，因为资金问题，燃料不会加满。

sktok_dsbell.name: 应急治疗协议
sktok_dsbell.description: 激活持续治愈周围大范围我方累积的<$ba.dt.neural>神经损伤</>；被<自动维护机器>激活时治疗能力大幅度提升

sktok_dstnta.name: 摄食
sktok_dstnta.description: 使目标<$ba.stun>晕眩</>并持续受到物理与神经损伤

sktok_canoe_1.name: 放置平台
sktok_canoe_1.description: 在水上建立可以部署<@ba.vup>任意</>单位的平台

sktok_canoe_2.name: 放置平台
sktok_canoe_2.description: 在水上建立可以部署<@ba.vup>任意</>单位的平台

sktok_fcanon.name: 开炮！
sktok_fcanon.description: 向前方射出一发炮弹，碰到第一名我方干员时造成范围物理伤害

sktok_dupilr.name: 支柱坍塌
sktok_dupilr.description: 被击倒后，对倒下两格造成真实伤害与晕眩并使范围内的我方单位强制撤退，并在可部署地块上生成阻挡路线的<战场废墟>

sktok_duruin.name: Blockade
sktok_duruin.description: 改变敌人的行进路线\n<@ba.rem>如果废墟阻挡了敌人，敌人会破坏此废墟</>

sktok_dublst.name: 爆破
sktok_dublst.description: 对前方一格造成伤害并小力度推动敌人，直接击倒<破碎支柱>

sktok_oxygen.name: 防水蚀镀膜装置
sktok_oxygen.description: 使身前一格的我方单位免疫"水蚀"（“水蚀”：攻击速度降低，每秒受到一定<$ba.dt.erosion>侵蚀损伤</>，受到攻击时额外受到敌人攻击力一定比例的<$ba.dt.erosion>侵蚀损伤</>）

sktok_neonlamp.name: 文明的光芒
sktok_neonlamp.description: 视野范围扩大，持续时间永久

sktok_candle.name: 骑士的荣耀
sktok_candle.description: 部署后立刻获得该地块的视野

sktok_vultres.name: 诱人珍宝
sktok_vultres.description: 被敌人触碰就会消失；若战斗结束时仍存在于场上，会额外获得1源石锭

sktok_slowfd.name: 高压喷射
sktok_slowfd.description: 使周围范围内的敌人移动速度<@ba.vup>-60%</>

sktok_airbomb.name: 砰！
sktok_airbomb.description: 将周围的敌人<@ba.vup>较大力地</>推开

sktok_dancdol.name: 剧目宣告
sktok_dancdol.description: 使周围的我方单位攻击力<@ba.vdown>-25%</>并持续受到真实伤害

sktok_tileblock.name: 不可部署
sktok_tileblock.description: 此处已被封印，无法部署任何单位。

sktok_wpnsts_1.name: 拉特兰式冰淇淋
sktok_wpnsts_1.description: 使周围所有友方单位每<@ba.vup>2</>秒回复<@ba.vup>1</>点技力\n被夺取后立刻对周围所有友方单位造成<@ba.vup>1000</>点法术伤害并<$ba.stun>晕眩</><@ba.vup>5</>秒

sktok_wpnsts_2.name: 拉特兰式冰淇淋
sktok_wpnsts_2.description: 使周围所有友方单位每<@ba.vup>2</>秒回复<@ba.vup>1</>点技力\n被夺取后立刻对周围所有友方单位造成<@ba.vup>1000</>点法术伤害并<$ba.stun>晕眩</><@ba.vup>5</>秒

sktok_peacokfool.name: 断罪模式！
sktok_peacokfool.description: 猛烈开火！（自身释放更多的子弹，自身和友方干员攻击速度提升。）

sktok_bouncy_1.name: 圣徒之手
sktok_bouncy_1.description: 向部署方向弹射“圣徒之手”，晕眩并伤害碰撞到的敌人

sktok_bouncy_2.name: 圣徒之手·清理模式
sktok_bouncy_2.description: 向部署方向弹射“圣徒之手”，晕眩并伤害碰撞到的敌人，清洗沿路的“溟痕”

sktok_bouncy_3.name: 圣徒之手·巡回模式
sktok_bouncy_3.description: 向部署方向弹射“圣徒之手”，晕眩并伤害碰撞到的敌人；若碰撞到墙壁则会反弹，重复碰撞到敌人会延长晕眩时间

sktok_magiccircle.name: 调谐
sktok_magiccircle.description: 激活并部署我方单位时，发出新的<@ba.kw>重整束流</>

sktok_buffcard.name: 升格
sktok_buffcard.description: 部署后，使身前一名干员获得如下效果：立即获得<@ba.kw>2件</>本职业的<@ba.kw>战术装备</>（部署效果无法触发）。\n<@ba.rem>触发后自身消失（本场战斗不再出现）</>

sktok_supplycard.name: 新遣
sktok_supplycard.description: 部署后，从<@ba.vup>预备区</>随机检视<@ba.vup>{range_num}名</>单位，可选择<@ba.vup>0-{can_select_num}名</>单位调度至待部署区。\n<@ba.rem>触发后自身消失（本场战斗不再出现）</>

sktok_recyclecard.name: 蓄锐
sktok_recyclecard.description: 部署后，使身前一名干员立即返回待部署区且再部署时间<@ba.vup>-95%</>、部署费用<@ba.vup>{value}</>且下次部署时保留所有已继承的战术装备。\n<@ba.rem>触发后自身消失（本场战斗不再出现）</>

sktok_revivecard.name: 回召
sktok_revivecard.description: 部署后，从<@ba.vup>休整区</>随机检视<@ba.vup>{range_num}名</>单位，可选择<@ba.vup>0-{can_select_num}名</>单位调度至待部署区。\n<@ba.rem>触发后自身消失（本场战斗不再出现）</>

sktok_btauntcard.name: 晶化
sktok_btauntcard.description: 可以<@ba.vup>被我方攻击</>，25秒后对攻击范围内的所有我方单位造成<@ba.vup>{damage}</>点<@ba.vup>真实</>伤害并<$ba.stun>晕眩</><@ba.vup>{stun}</>秒\n被摧毁后，从<@ba.vup>预备区</>随机检视<@ba.vup>4名</>单位，可选择<@ba.vup>0-1</>名单位使其消失（本场战斗不再出现）且转换为<@ba.vup>15张</>调用凭证。\n<@ba.rem>触发后自身消失（本场战斗不再出现）</>

sktok_bbombcard.name: 爆炸
sktok_bbombcard.description: 被调度时触发爆炸，使全场所有我方单位造成<@ba.vup>{damage}</>点<@ba.vup>真实</>伤害并<$ba.stun>晕眩</><@ba.vup>{stun}</>秒

sktok_salecard.name: 临调
sktok_salecard.description: 部署后，从<@ba.vup>预备区</>随机检视<@ba.vup>{range_num}名</>单位，可选择<@ba.vup>0-{can_select_num}名</>单位使其消失（本场战斗不再出现）且转换为<@ba.vup>{sell_card_gold}</>调用凭证。\n<@ba.rem>触发后自身消失（本场战斗不再出现）</>

sktok_bgarmn_1.name: 研究成功
sktok_bgarmn_1.description: 吸收范围内的实验产物回复技力，技力满时启动

sktok_bgarms_1.name: 研究成功
sktok_bgarms_1.description: 吸收范围内的实验产物回复技力，技力满时启动

sktok_rmtarmn_1.name: 研究成功
sktok_rmtarmn_1.description: 吸收范围内的实验产物回复技力，技力满时启动

sktok_rmtarms_1.name: 研究成功
sktok_rmtarms_1.description: 吸收范围内的实验产物回复技力，技力满时启动

sktok_garage_1.name: 自走车出击！
sktok_garage_1.description: 消耗<@ba.vup>{cost}</>点部署费用，向自身部署方向发射一辆<@ba.vup>自走车</>\n<@ba.rem>自走车出发后沿直线移动，行驶到不可通行区域会出局，经过自走车单行道或我方单位时，会改变移动方向为其部署方向（每个单位仅一次）</>

sktok_garage_2.name: 自走车出击！
sktok_garage_2.description: 开启后持续自动发射<@ba.vup>自走车</>，每次消耗<@ba.vup>{cost}</>点部署费用向自身部署方向发射一辆，再次使用技能可关闭自动发射\n<@ba.rem>自走车出发后沿直线移动，行驶到不可通行区域会出局，经过自走车单行道或我方单位时，会改变移动方向为其部署方向（每个单位仅一次）</>

sktok_turngear.name: 自走车定向！
sktok_turngear.description: 使经过的<@ba.vup>自走车</>改为向自身部署方向移动，并使其移动速度短暂提升

sktok_paras.name: 繁衍
sktok_paras.description: 部署后，生成<@ba.vup>{cnt}</>个<@ba.vup>荧壳源石虫</>

sktok_recodr_1.name: 实体程式
sktok_recodr_1.description: 本波次内，我方干员的攻击力、防御力和最大生命值大幅提升。<@ba.rem>通过本波次后再次进入关卡时可以开启</>

sktok_recodr_2.name: 实体程式
sktok_recodr_2.description: 本波次内，我方干员的攻击力、防御力和最大生命值大幅提升。<@ba.rem>本波次结束后失效</>

sktok_rarebox.name: 更诱人珍宝
sktok_rarebox.description: 反弹部分受到的伤害，击破额外获得4源石锭

sktok_aidkit.name: First Aid
sktok_aidkit.description: 恢复攻击范围内一名友方单位<@ba.vup>1000</>生命值

sktok_allydonq.name: 冲锋
sktok_allydonq.description: 下次攻击造成相当于攻击力<@ba.vup>200%</>的物理伤害，并大力地弹开目标

sktok_tbattbc.name: 钳兽壳粉
sktok_tbattbc.description: "暴食之果"的攻击力<@ba.vup>+20%</>，防御力<@ba.vup>+20%</>(可叠加)

sktok_tbpsnc.name: 高效泡打粉
sktok_tbpsnc.description: 使全场所有友方单位每秒受到<@ba.vup>15</>点真实伤害(可叠加)

sktok_tbsmmc.name: 芳香精油
sktok_tbsmmc.description: "暴食之果"呼唤伙伴帮助自己(每次使用都会呼唤更强的伙伴)

sktok_larva.name: 汲营枯枝
sktok_larva.description: 释放【污染秽蚀】，使周围的我方单位持续流失生命，生命降至一半后对周围造成凋亡损伤

sktok_allady.name: 阿勒黛的卫护
sktok_allady.description: 部署后，为目标及其周围的我方单位施加可吸收1000点伤害的<$ba.barrier>屏障</>

sktok_cdabyss.name: 阿戈尔示波器
sktok_cdabyss.description: 从预备区随机检视4名单位，选择最多2名消失，并令场上所有深海猎人干员获得其职业的战术装备；若场上没有深海干员则改为从预备区随机调度一名深海猎人干员

sktok_cdabyssa.name: 阿戈尔示波器
sktok_cdabyssa.description: 从预备区随机检视4名单位，选择最多2名消失，并令场上所有深海猎人干员获得其职业的战术装备；若场上没有深海干员则改为从预备区随机调度一名深海猎人干员

sktok_cdabyssb.name: 阿戈尔示波器
sktok_cdabyssb.description: 从预备区随机检视4名单位，选择最多2名消失，并令场上所有深海猎人干员获得其职业的战术装备；若场上没有深海干员则改为从预备区随机调度一名深海猎人干员。之后20秒内全场所有被深海猎人阻挡的敌人陷入<$ba.stun>晕眩</>

sktok_cdcredit.name: 自适应补给
sktok_cdcredit.description: 技能生效时获得等同于我方小队总干员数量的调用凭证

sktok_cdcredita.name: 自适应补给
sktok_cdcredita.description: 技能生效时获得等同于我方小队总干员数量的调用凭证

sktok_cdcreditb.name: 自适应补给
sktok_cdcreditb.description: 技能生效时获得等同于我方小队总干员数量的调用凭证

sktok_cdshield.name: 镀膜
sktok_cdshield.description: 为前方的干员添加相当于其生命上限<@ba.vup>{shield_scale:0%}</>的<$ba.barrier>屏障</>，并使其阻挡数+2

sktok_cdshielda.name: 重整导能
sktok_cdshielda.description: 处于待部署区时，使其他干员和导能单元的部署费用-3；部署后立即为【镀膜装置导能阀】回复一次充能，并进行一次干员调用

sktok_cdshieldb.name: 镀膜
sktok_cdshieldb.description: 为前方的干员添加相当于其生命上限<@ba.vup>{shield_scale:0%}</>的<$ba.barrier>屏障</>

sktok_cdbeacon.name: 示踪信标
sktok_cdbeacon.description: 容易受到我方攻击，被我方干员攻击时，为其回复1点技力，并提高目标的攻击速度

sktok_cdbeacona.name: 阻断波长
sktok_cdbeacona.description: 立即获得15点调用凭证，【丛林用示踪信标】周围的敌人<$ba.sluggish>停顿</>，持续10秒

sktok_cdbeaconb.name: 干扰波长
sktok_cdbeaconb.description: 立即进行一次干员调用，【丛林用示踪信标】周围的敌人获得100%的<$ba.fragile>脆弱</>效果，持续10秒

sktok_cdhvrk.name: 超重，绝缘
sktok_cdhvrk.description: 处于待部署区时，使其他干员和导能单元的部署费用+2

sktok_cdflsb.name: 劣质闪光弹
sktok_cdflsb.description: 被调用时，自毁并<$ba.stun>晕眩</>所有我方高台单位8秒

sktok_xbfarm.name: 稻谷种植
sktok_xbfarm.description: 放置后每天产出一定数量的<稻谷>（同类建筑最多放置12个）

sktok_xbfortress.name: 搭建高台
sktok_xbfortress.description: I级：堡垒，部署后可以使远程位干员部署其上

sktok_xbfortress.name: 搭建高台
sktok_xbfortress.description: II级：更加坚固的堡垒，部署后可以使远程位干员部署其上

sktok_xbfortress.name: 搭建高台
sktok_xbfortress.description: III级：非常坚固的堡垒，部署后可以使远程位干员部署其上

sktok_xbroadblock.name: 阻断道路
sktok_xbroadblock.description: I级：部署后可以阻止敌人前进路线使其绕路

sktok_xbroadblock.name: 阻断道路
sktok_xbroadblock.description: II级：更加坚固，部署后可以阻止敌人前进路线使其绕路且自身获得<$ba.camou>迷彩</>效果

sktok_xboverwatch.name: 监控
sktok_xboverwatch.description: I级：可以侦查范围内的视野

sktok_xboverwatch.name: 监控
sktok_xboverwatch.description: II级：可以侦查范围内的视野，范围较大较坚固且自身获得<$ba.camou>迷彩</>效果

sktok_xboverwatch.name: 监控
sktok_xboverwatch.description: III级：可以侦查范围内的视野，范围更大更坚固且自身获得<$ba.camou>迷彩</>效果

sktok_xbbase.name: 能源设备
sktok_xbbase.description: 注意防守！被击破后本局失败！

sktok_redtower.name: 敌方人员运送
sktok_redtower.description: 敌方老巢，击败该地区的全部老巢使该地区不会刷新精英敌袭

sktok_hiddenstone.name: 可被击破
sktok_hiddenstone.description: 击破后可解锁隐藏区域

sktok_vegetation.name: 可供开采
sktok_vegetation.description: 击破后可以获得一些素材

sktok_gtreasure.name: 可被击破
sktok_gtreasure.description: 击破后可以获得一些宝物

sktok_streasure.name: 宝刺伤人
sktok_streasure.description: 击破后可以获得一些珍贵宝物，受到攻击时会反弹真实伤害

sktok_bondtw.name: 发射缚网
sktok_bondtw.description: I级：对前方一名敌方释放束缚网束缚<@ba.vup>{unmove_duration}</>秒

sktok_bondtw.name: 发射缚网
sktok_bondtw.description: II级：对前方一名敌方释放束缚网束缚<@ba.vup>{unmove_duration}</>秒

sktok_pushtw.name: 气体爆喷
sktok_pushtw.description: I级：将前方一名敌人<@ba.vup>中等力度地</>推开

sktok_pushtw.name: 气体爆喷
sktok_pushtw.description: II级：将前方一名敌人<@ba.vup>中等力度地</>推开

sktok_xbwall.name: 防御支撑
sktok_xbwall.description: I级：用来阻挡敌人前进（但不会改变路线）

sktok_xbwall.name: 防御支撑
sktok_xbwall.description: II级：更加坚固，用来阻挡敌人前进（但不会改变路线）

sktok_xbmrcl.name: 演算
sktok_xbmrcl.description: 放置后每局结算时会额外获得建设点数（同类建筑最多放置4个）

sktok_xbprsh.name: 资源规划
sktok_xbprsh.description: I级：放置后每场战斗额外获得一个部署位置（同类建筑最多放置3个）

sktok_xbprsh.name: 资源规划
sktok_xbprsh.description: II级：放置后每场战斗额外获得两个部署位置（同类建筑最多放置3个）

sktok_xblrsh.name: 人员状态改善
sktok_xblrsh.description: I级：放置后每场战斗额外获得2点关卡生命值（同类建筑最多放置5个）

sktok_xblrsh.name: 人员状态改善
sktok_xblrsh.description: II级：放置后每场战斗额外获得3点关卡生命值（同类建筑最多放置5个）

sktok_xbescp.name: 建立通讯
sktok_xbescp.description: I级：放置后，每局第9天后解锁跨域通讯（同类建筑最多放置1个）

sktok_xbescp.name: 建立通讯
sktok_xbescp.description: II级：放置后，每局第6天后解锁跨域通讯（同类建筑最多放置1个）

sktok_wdescp.name: 建立通讯
sktok_wdescp.description: 部署近战位干员可以获得单局信物<跨地块通讯终端>（本局内解锁跨域通讯）

sktok_xbgldn.name: 冶铸
sktok_xbgldn.description: I级：放置后，可以用<清水>与<铁矿石>来合成<粗制赤金>（同类建筑最多放置1个）

sktok_xbgldn.name: 冶铸
sktok_xbgldn.description: II级：放置后，可以用<清水>与<铁矿石>来合成更多<粗制赤金>（同类建筑最多放置1个）

sktok_xbgldn.name: 冶铸
sktok_xbgldn.description: III级：放置后，可以用<清水>与<铁矿石>来合成大量<粗制赤金>（同类建筑最多放置1个）

sktok_xbfato.name: 采集
sktok_xbfato.description: 生产<采集专员>来采集<杂木林>、<巨大岩石>、<奇异矿脉>，更擅长采集<杂木林>，最多生产3台

sktok_xbfato2.name: 采集
sktok_xbfato2.description: 生产<采集专员>来采集<杂木林>、<巨大岩石>、<奇异矿脉>，更擅长采集<巨大岩石>，最多生产3台

sktok_xbfato3.name: 采集
sktok_xbfato3.description: 生产<采集专员>来采集<杂木林>、<巨大岩石>、<奇异矿脉>，更擅长采集<奇异矿脉>，最多生产4台

sktok_wfactory.name: 抽水
sktok_wfactory.description: 可以采集<清澈水域>上的<清水>

sktok_shielder.name: 护盾提供
sktok_shielder.description: 每隔一段时间为一位友方单位提供<$ba.barrier>屏障</>

sktok_smokebomb.name: 释放迷香
sktok_smokebomb.description: 使周围八格范围内敌人<$ba.sleep>沉睡</><@ba.vup>{duration_normal}</>秒，对动物有特殊效果

sktok_enhancer.name: 释放秘药
sktok_enhancer.description: 部署后，使面前干员攻击速度提高<@ba.vup>+{attack_speed}</>，持续时间结束后强制撤退面前的干员（返还部分部署费用）

sktok_umbrella.name: 协助隐藏
sktok_umbrella.description: 可部署在低地与高台地块，周围八格范围内所有友方单位获得<$ba.camou>迷彩</>效果

sktok_repairman.name: 修理
sktok_repairman.description: 可部署在低地与高台地块，使面前建筑每秒恢复生命值

sktok_trademan_1.name: 触发对话
sktok_trademan_1.description: 主动开启技能，与该角色对话

sktok_oldisin_1.name: 触发对话
sktok_oldisin_1.description: 主动开启技能，与该角色对话

sktok_poachr.name: 盗猎食材
sktok_poachr.description: 击倒野生动物时会将其掉落的食材收集拿走，被击倒时会掉落已收集的食材与额外奖励

sktok_mhflsb.name: 眩光手雷
sktok_mhflsb.description: 向前投掷后爆炸，使未背对爆炸中心的敌方<$ba.stun>晕眩</>，并击落部分空中单位

sktok_mhlbmb.name: 高能源石爆桶
sktok_mhlbmb.description: 部署后可手动开启，对周围造成法术伤害并引爆其他<高能源石爆桶>

sktok_mhshok.name: 高压脉冲诡雷
sktok_mhshok.description: 部署后需要一定时间展开，被敌人踩到时对附近造成<$ba.stun>晕眩</>

sktok_mhwrbg.name: 滞空牵引无人机
sktok_mhwrbg.description: 可部署至我方干员所在位置，之后可再次指定另一位置，使该干员快速移动至此处

sktok_smpow.name: 启动
sktok_smpow.description: 使【无垠回荡克雷松】的无敌<@ba.vup>{duration}</>秒内失效；\n<$ba.charged>蓄力</>额外效果：无敌失效延长至<@ba.vup>{enhance_duration}</>秒，并清除范围内的所有【苗圃】

sktok_smpow.name: 启动

sktok_smrbox.name: 刺人珍宝
sktok_smrbox.description: 反弹部分受到的伤害，击破额外获得4源石锭

sktok_stdurk_1.name: “咔嚓！”
sktok_stdurk_1.description: 尝试录制有趣的片段，存储于素材库中。但是有<@ba.vdown>{prob:0%}</>的概率会拍摄失败，<$ba.stun>晕眩</>并无法撤退<@ba.vdown>{stun_duration}</>秒。

sktok_crsbow.name: 清债程序
sktok_crsbow.description: 向前方连续射出3颗子弹，每颗子弹对碰到的第一名我方干员造成物理伤害

sktok_snflwr.name: 全自动划账
sktok_snflwr.description: 每隔一定时间扣除1点部署费用

sktok_smkbmb.name: 爆裂
sktok_smkbmb.description: 被调度时使全场除“毒瘤”外的所有敌方单位获得<@ba.vup>20</>秒<$ba.invisible>隐匿</>效果

sktok_cdaltar.name: 能量扰动
sktok_cdaltar.description: 每<@ba.vup>7</>秒对范围内所有敌人随机施加以下任意一个异常效果（<$ba.sluggish>停顿</>、<$ba.root>束缚</>、<$ba.cold>寒冷</>、<$ba.frozen>冻结</>、<$ba.stun>晕眩</>、<$ba.levitate>浮空</>），持续<@ba.vup>2.5</>秒

sktok_cdaltara.name: 能量扰动
sktok_cdaltara.description: 每<@ba.vup>7</>秒对范围内所有敌人随机施加以下任意一个异常效果（<$ba.sluggish>停顿</>、<$ba.root>束缚</>、<$ba.cold>寒冷</>、<$ba.frozen>冻结</>、<$ba.stun>晕眩</>、<$ba.levitate>浮空</>），持续<@ba.vup>2.5</>秒

sktok_cdaltarb.name: 能量扰动
sktok_cdaltarb.description: 每<@ba.vup>7</>秒对范围内所有敌人随机施加以下任意一个异常效果（<$ba.sluggish>停顿</>、<$ba.root>束缚</>、<$ba.cold>寒冷</>、<$ba.frozen>冻结</>、<$ba.stun>晕眩</>、<$ba.levitate>浮空</>），持续<@ba.vup>2.5</>秒

sktok_cddiff.name: 战术装备整理
sktok_cddiff.description: 部署后，使前方干员的<@ba.vup>每一种</>战术装备+1<@ba.vup>临时</>层数（不受战术装备层数上限影响），持续<@ba.vup>{add_status_dur}</>秒

sktok_cddiffa.name: 战术装备整理
sktok_cddiffa.description: 部署后，使前方干员的<@ba.vup>每一种</>战术装备+1<@ba.vup>临时</>层数（不受战术装备层数上限影响），持续<@ba.vup>{add_status_dur}</>秒

sktok_cddiffb.name: 战术装备整理
sktok_cddiffb.description: 部署后，使前方干员的<@ba.vup>每一种</>战术装备+1<@ba.vup>临时</>层数（不受战术装备层数上限影响），持续<@ba.vup>{add_status_dur}</>秒

sktok_cdheal.name: 便携式医疗设备
sktok_cdheal.description: 部署后，从<@ba.vup>预备区</>随机检视<@ba.vup>{range_num}名</>单位，可选择<@ba.vup>0-{can_select_num}名</>单位调度至待部署区，并令场上所有医疗干员获得其职业的战术装备

sktok_cdheala.name: 便携式医疗设备
sktok_cdheala.description: 部署后，从<@ba.vup>预备区</>随机检视<@ba.vup>{range_num}名</>单位，可选择<@ba.vup>0-{can_select_num}名</>单位调度至待部署区，并令场上所有医疗干员获得其职业的战术装备

sktok_cdhealb.name: 便携式医疗设备
sktok_cdhealb.description: 部署后，从<@ba.vup>预备区</>随机检视<@ba.vup>{range_num}名</>单位，可选择<@ba.vup>0-{can_select_num}名</>单位调度至待部署区，并令场上所有医疗干员获得其职业的战术装备

sktok_eradio.name: 喷气散热
sktok_eradio.description: 被动：受到攻击时回复<@ba.vup>{sp}</>点技力\n开启后<@ba.vup>{duration}</>秒内每秒对攻击范围内所有地面敌人和我方单位造成<@ba.vdown>{value}</>点法术伤害，额外使敌人移动速度<@ba.vup>-{-move_speed:0%}</>并获得<@ba.vdown>{energy}</>点能量

sktok_eradio.name: 喷气散热
sktok_eradio.description: 被动：受到攻击时回复<@ba.vup>{sp}</>点技力\n开启后<@ba.vup>{duration}</>秒内每秒对攻击范围内所有地面敌人和我方单位造成<@ba.vdown>{value}</>点法术伤害，额外使敌人移动速度<@ba.vup>-{-move_speed:0%}</>并获得<@ba.vdown>{energy}</>点能量

sktok_eradio.name: 喷气散热
sktok_eradio.description: 被动：受到攻击时回复<@ba.vup>{sp}</>点技力\n开启后<@ba.vup>{duration}</>秒内每秒对攻击范围内所有地面敌人和我方单位造成<@ba.vdown>{value}</>点法术伤害，额外使敌人移动速度<@ba.vup>-{-move_speed:0%}</>并获得<@ba.vdown>{energy}</>点能量

sktok_eradio.name: 喷气散热
sktok_eradio.description: 被动：受到攻击时回复<@ba.vup>{sp}</>点技力\n开启后<@ba.vup>{duration}</>秒内每秒对攻击范围内所有地面敌人和我方单位造成<@ba.vdown>{value}</>点法术伤害，额外使敌人移动速度<@ba.vup>-{-move_speed:0%}</>并获得<@ba.vdown>{energy}</>点能量

sktok_bonore.name: 唤血祭坛
sktok_bonore.description: 释放脉冲波吸收范围内的所有<@ba.vup>血珀</>，并转化成<@ba.vup>新生血裔</>

sktok_outset.name: 炸弹载荷点
sktok_outset.description: 消耗10点部署费用，生成会驶向下个唤血祭坛的<@ba.vup>反巫术变位炸弹</>（已存在时无法生成）

sktok_bldore.name: 沥血王座
sktok_bldore.description: 释放血雾对笼罩的我方单位造成越来越高的法术伤害并降低40点攻击速度，被血雾笼罩的<@ba.vup>血珀</>会转化成<@ba.vup>新生血裔</>

sktok_toolore.name: 脉冲波
sktok_toolore.description: 从周围每个敌方单位获取<@ba.vup>{exp}</>调查熟练度（同一个敌方单位只触发一次）

sktok_tooltower.name: 法术传输协议
sktok_tooltower.description: 在周围四格部署我方单位为其回复技力\n激活后，每次攻击对一名敌方单位造成<@ba.vup>2%</>生命上限的法术伤害并获取<@ba.vup>3</>调查熟练度

sktok_tooltree.name: 天然隐蔽
sktok_tooltree.description: 相邻的我方单位防御<@ba.vup>提升</>，且击倒敌人获取更多调查熟练度

sktok_toolinvert.name: 撼动现实
sktok_toolinvert.description: 部署后爆炸，对周围四格所有敌方单位造成<@ba.vup>{attack@damage}</>法术伤害，并对每个敌方单位获取<@ba.vup>{attack@exp}</>调查熟练度

sktok_toolgarage.name: 自走车出击！
sktok_toolgarage.description: 消耗<@ba.vup>{cost}</>点部署费用并流失<@ba.vdown>200</>点生命，向自身部署方向发射一辆勘察用自走车\n<@ba.rem>自走车出发后沿直线移动，行驶到不可通行区域会出局，经过我方单位时，会改变移动方向为其部署方向（每个单位仅一次）</>

sktok_ltstat.name: 祈祷
sktok_ltstat.description: 消耗<@ba.vup>{cost}</>点部署费用，使周围8格内修道院居民恐慌大幅降低

sktok_rockfl.name: 塌落
sktok_rockfl.description: 周期性掉落落石，沿坡道向前方滚动，对经过的我方单位和临时步道造成物理伤害；被阻挡后炸开，对阻挡目标造成物理伤害，并对爆炸中心及周围4格造成溅射伤害

sktok_stmpq.name: 景观喷泉
sktok_stmpq.description: 周围友方干员攻击地面目标时，会在其所在的地块产生纯白水汽

sktok_stmbot.name: 水汽汽水瓶
sktok_stmbot.description: 被击破时在周围产生纯白水汽

sktok_cdcvrt.name: 溢能回收
sktok_cdcvrt.description: 立刻获得等同于场上地面位干员阻挡数之和<@ba.vup>{cnt}</>倍的调用凭证

sktok_cdcvrta.name: 溢能回收
sktok_cdcvrta.description: 立刻获得等同于场上地面位干员阻挡数之和<@ba.vup>{cnt}</>倍的调用凭证

sktok_cdrone.name: 战地援护
sktok_cdrone.description: 周期性流失<@ba.vdown>{hp_ratio:0%}</>最大生命值（但不会因此退场）并平均治疗攻击范围内所有单位的生命值与元素损伤，总治疗量等同于流失的生命值<@ba.vup>{heal_scale}</>倍

sktok_cdkzmr.name: 竞技记录分析
sktok_cdkzmr.description: 待部署区内所有卡西米尔干员<@ba.vup>{value}</>部署费用

sktok_truamr.name: “甜蜜狂搅”
sktok_truamr.description: 部署后使前方地面位干员的阻挡数增加<@ba.vup>{attack@block_cnt}</>，该效果在干员被“超甜微笑”冲撞后失效

sktok_ltnova.name: 神经再生
sktok_ltnova.description: 回复周围单位<@ba.vup>{attack@ep_heal_ratio}</>点神经损伤并解除晕眩

sktok_condtr.name: 广域调谐
sktok_condtr.description:
变奏期间开启可以<@ba.vup>切换激昂/沉郁变奏</>，并使我方获得持续<@ba.vup>20s</>的加成效果：
切换到激昂变奏下，攻击速度<@ba.vup>+50</>；
切换到沉郁变奏下，攻击力<@ba.vup>+60%</>但攻击速度<@ba.vup>-10</>；
场上每多一个调谐节点开启时获得的效果<@ba.vup>叠加</>一层

sktok_condtr.description:

sktok_portlent.name: 湮灭
sktok_portlent.description: 吸收受到的所有伤害，传送到创生之相

sktok_portlexi.name: 创生
sktok_portlexi.description: 将湮灭之相吸收的伤害转化为<@ba.vup>物理伤害</>，向前方发射子弹释放

sktok_winfire.name: Ignite
sktok_winfire.description: 开启后使紧急供暖器周围8格内的干员免疫环境封冻效果

sktok_winstone.name: 紧急点燃
sktok_winstone.description: 立刻点燃一个未燃烧的紧急供暖器

sktok_mercha.name: 战地鼓舞
sktok_mercha.description: 使面前一格干员攻击力<@ba.vup>+{atk:0%}</>，若剩余部署费用不小于<@ba.vup>20</>点，消耗20点部署费用使其攻击力额外<@ba.vup>+{atk:0%}</>\n（每名干员至多+80% ，已满层则不触发额外耗费）

sktok_merchaa.name: 战地鼓舞
sktok_merchaa.description: 使面前一格干员攻击力<@ba.vup>+{atk:0%}</>，若剩余部署费用不小于<@ba.vup>20</>点，消耗20点部署费用使其攻击力额外<@ba.vup>+{atk:0%}</>\n（每名干员至多+80% ，已满层则不触发额外耗费）

sktok_merchab.name: 战地鼓舞
sktok_merchab.description: 使面前一格干员攻击力<@ba.vup>+{atk:0%}</>，若剩余部署费用不小于<@ba.vup>20</>点，消耗20点部署费用使其攻击力额外<@ba.vup>+{atk:0%}</>\n（每名干员至多+80% ，已满层则不触发额外耗费）

sktok_sniper.name: 空域控制
sktok_sniper.description: 检视预备区0-4名单位，选择1名加入待部署区。若选择了<@ba.vup>狙击干员</>，使场上所有干员获得1件狙击战术装备，并使他们本场战斗装备最大层数+1（至多+3层）

sktok_snipera.name: 空域控制
sktok_snipera.description: 检视预备区0-4名单位，选择1名加入待部署区。若选择了<@ba.vup>狙击干员</>，使场上所有干员获得1件狙击战术装备，并使他们本场战斗装备最大层数+1（至多+3层）

sktok_sniperb.name: 空域控制
sktok_sniperb.description: 检视2次，每次检视预备区0-4名单位，选择1名加入待部署区。若选择了<@ba.vup>狙击干员</>，使场上所有干员获得1件狙击战术装备，并使他们本场战斗装备最大层数+1（至多+3层）

sktok_gasbot.name: 速效制冷
sktok_gasbot.description: 每损失<@ba.vup>10%</>生命值，对周围所有敌人施加<$ba.cold>寒冷</>效果，持续<@ba.vup>{cold}</>秒

sktok_gasbota.name: 速效制冷
sktok_gasbota.description: 每损失<@ba.vup>10%</>生命值，对周围所有敌人施加<$ba.cold>寒冷</>效果，持续<@ba.vup>{cold}</>秒

sktok_gasbotb.name: 速效制冷
sktok_gasbotb.description: 每损失<@ba.vup>10%</>生命值，对周围所有敌人施加<$ba.cold>寒冷</>效果，持续<@ba.vup>{cold}</>秒

sktok_beer.name: “蜜酿万岁！”
sktok_beer.description: 部署后，在一段时间延迟后爆炸，使周围8格内的“烈酒金刚”失去免疫效果<@ba.vup>{break_duration}</>秒，然后使范围内的敌人晕眩<@ba.vup>{stun_duration}</>秒
